channel.title: SSUN EDU - Language Learning Updates
channel.description: Free language learning updates from SSUN EDU: Japanese, English, Spanish, and Korean study pages.

item.title: SSUN EDU Home
item.description: Explore the free language learning platform and start studying with flashcards.

item.title: Japanese Katakana Words
item.description: Practice Japanese katakana words with interactive flashcards.

item.title: Japanese Katakana Characters
item.description: Learn katakana characters with quizzes and card study mode.

item.title: Japanese Hiragana Characters
item.description: Master hiragana characters with guided practice.

item.title: Japanese Sentences
item.description: Study practical Japanese sentences and improve comprehension.

item.title: Japanese Kanji
item.description: Learn Japanese kanji with readings, meanings, and writing practice.

item.title: Japanese Verbs
item.description: Practice Japanese verb forms with examples and listening support.

item.title: English Words
item.description: Build English vocabulary with spaced flashcard study.

item.title: Spanish Words
item.description: Study essential Spanish words in a simple card format.

item.title: Spanish Sentences
item.description: Practice useful Spanish sentence patterns for daily conversation.

item.title: Korean Words
item.description: Learn Korean vocabulary with short, repeatable card sessions.

item.title: Korean Characters
item.description: Train Korean character recognition with interactive cards.

item.title: Korean Syllables
item.description: Practice Korean syllable combinations and reading speed.

item.title: Support
item.description: Get help and contact support for SSUN EDU.
